locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Kids Learn Sticker
locale.subtitle: Sticker and Learn
locale.description: This is a baby's favorite child learning and cognitive software, baby only need to drag the left of the sticker picture to the right position on the right, let the baby in the easy game process, quickly understand the various common animals, plants, flowers, vehicles and so on, at the same time exercise the baby's observation, imagination and logical thinking can Power. Come on, baby, enjoy the fun of sticker games! Our product features: 1, simple operation: move small fingers to drag pictures, and babies are more likely to get started. 2, learning cognition: playing games while recognizing all kinds of things, and teaching and enjoying music. 3, beautiful voice: let the baby learn the standard pronunciation of common things quickly. 4, content rich: four scenes, multiple checkpoints, covering more than 100 kinds of common things in life. 5, exquisite pictures: select more than 100 high-definition pictures to give your baby the perfect visual experience.
locale.promotional_text: Learn the common things in life by stickers

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 儿童认知贴贴乐
locale.subtitle: 贴纸认知游戏
locale.description: 这是一款宝宝们喜爱的儿童学习认知软件，宝宝只需将左边的贴纸图片拖到右边对应的位置即可，让宝宝在轻松的游戏过程中，快速认识各种常见的动物，植物，花卉，车辆等，同时锻炼了宝宝的观察力、想象力和逻辑思维能力。 宝宝们，赶快来体验贴纸游戏的乐趣吧！ 我们产品的特色： 1、操作简单：动动小手指拖动图片，宝宝更易上手。 2，学习认知：一边玩游戏一边认识各种事物，寓教于乐。 3，优美语音：让宝宝快速学会常见事物的标准发音。 4、内容丰富：四大场景，多重关卡，涵盖100多种生活中常见的事物。 5、精美图片：精选100多幅高清图片，给宝宝完美的视觉体验。
locale.promotional_text: 通过贴纸学习生活中常见的事物

keywords.keyword: 阳阳爱写字魔力小孩过年宝宝学写字中华恐龙园汉字与书法海绵宝宝做汉堡朵拉历险记学做饭宝宝爱洗澡三字经读写版宝宝书孕育跟我学写汉字蓝猫学拼音小嘀削削serato自由诵读经典儿歌巴巴熊巴巴宝贝熊孩子钢笔书法
